name: Hovercraft Chaos
description:
Download recommended for best experience.

Zoom around destroying all enemies in your path! Pickup a selection of items and weapons to add to your wheel! Stop the wheel at just the right time to use them. Be careful, the wheel can be deadly! You must decide when to play it safe, and when to take a chance!

Credits:

Programmer/Game Designer/Artist

Composer/Sound Designer
